problem.markdown: 5. In a dynamic latch, which of the following is NOT TRUE? ( ) Output level is corrupted by the leakage current ( ) Output level is corrupted by the charge sharing capacitors ( ) Output level is corrupted by the clock feedthrough (x) Output level is corrupted by the initial conditions (voltage) across the load capacitance
problem.p: 5. In a dynamic latch, which of the following is NOT TRUE?

choicegroup.choice: Output level is corrupted by the leakage current
Output level is corrupted by the charge sharing capacitors
Output level is corrupted by the clock feedthrough
Output level is corrupted by the initial conditions (voltage) across the load capacitance
